alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte and eastern Halifax Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Virgilina, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Boston... Redoak... Clover... Scottsburg... Hitesburg... Cluster Springs... and Staunton River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
